Package com.tngtech.infrastructure.util.io

Interface Summary
FileContentProvider Get the content of files.
FileLister List files from a file system
 

Class Summary
CachingFileContentProvider  
CachingFileLister Caching implementation of the FileLister interface.
DefaultFileContentProvider Default implementation of the FileContentProvider interface.
DefaultFileLister Simple implementation of the FileLister interface.
FileUtils  
IoUtils General utility methods for working with IO
SerializationUtil Utility functions if you want to work with serialization :-)
 

Enum Summary
FileType Class associating file extensions with its content types.
